title: Knowledge Engineering Study Group
content: Ant colonies accomplish internal communications by means of pheromones, chemical signatures which spread at the speed of smell. In this and similar meetups of the Knowledge Engineering Study Group, we fleshed out more of the biology around ants, likewise a way to appreciate the current state of [bioinformatics](https://nbviewer.org/github/4dsolutions/m4w/blob/main/bioinformatics.ipynb) as a disciplineFor more meeting notes and links, check [the M4W Coda](https://coda.io/d/Math4Wisdom_d0SvdI3KSto/Meetings_suxmi#_luvz5).
author: Kirby Urner
